profile.name: Arjun Prasad
profile.title: Industrial Engineering Graduate
profile.organization: Tesla & Zeiss Experience | Process Optimization Specialist | Arlington, TX

bio.introduction: Manufacturing Engineering Graduate with proven automation expertise at Tesla and precision engineering experience at Carl Zeiss. Specialized in process optimization, Lean Six Sigma methodologies, and advanced CAD design. Immediately available on OPT with 3-year work authorization - no sponsorship required.
bio.background: Demonstrated ability to streamline manufacturing processes, optimize supply chain workflows, and implement automation solutions. Expert in SolidWorks, CATIA V5, and Ansys for complex design and simulation, with hands-on experience in reverse engineering and quality solutions across automotive and precision manufacturing sectors.
bio.researchFocus: Focused on manufacturing automation and process improvement with quantified results including 80% reduction in project completion time, 30% increase in testing success rates, and 100% customer alignment in SAP ERP. Proven track record in cross-functional collaboration, technical training, and customer-facing engineering solutions.

publications.title: Engineering Intern
publications.description:
80% Cycle Time ReductionCross-Functional OptimizationCATIA V5 DesignFMEA Implementation

Key Achievements:
• Interned with the Automation Development and Tool Engineering team, focusing on process optimization and efficiency improvements for manufacturing operations
• Streamlined cross-functional supply chain workflows, achieving 80% reduction in average project completion time through reverse engineering and systematic process analysis
• Applied FMEA and root cause analysis to identify bottlenecks in tooling and material handling processes, improving reliability and reducing downtime across production lines
• Developed intricate designs for production station components, specifically focusing on dies and idle tables through proficient use of CATIA V5 CAD software
• Established consistent channels of communication with supervisors and team members, delivering detailed weekly updates on project milestones, challenges encountered, and strategic adjustments enhancing overall workflow efficiency across engineering teams
• Collaborated on automation initiatives that directly supported Tesla's manufacturing scale-up and production optimization goals

projects.title: Tesla Automation Development & Process Optimization
projects.shortDescription: Cross-functional supply chain workflow optimization achieving 80% reduction in project completion time through automation and reverse engineering.
projects.detailedDescription:
80% Cycle Time ReductionCATIA V5 DesignFMEA ImplementationProduction Optimization

Comprehensive automation development project during Tesla internship focusing on manufacturing process optimization and efficiency improvements. Streamlined cross-functional supply chain workflows through systematic reverse engineering and process analysis. Applied FMEA methodology and root cause analysis to identify critical bottlenecks in tooling and material handling processes. Developed intricate designs for production station components including dies and idle tables using advanced CATIA V5 CAD software. Established robust communication channels for project milestone tracking and strategic workflow adjustments across engineering teams. Project directly supported Tesla's manufacturing scale-up and production optimization goals in EV manufacturing.

projects.title: Smart Wheelchair Cushion Design & Performance Optimization
projects.shortDescription: Medical device R&D project utilizing SolidWorks 3D modeling and Ansys simulation achieving 30% increase in testing success rates.
projects.detailedDescription:
30% Testing Success Rate3D SolidWorks ModelingAnsys SimulationManufacturing Coordination

Comprehensive medical device design project at UT Arlington Research Institute focusing on smart wheelchair cushion development. Developed detailed 3D models utilizing advanced SolidWorks techniques to streamline product design processes and enable rapid prototyping. Conducted extensive Ansys simulation studies to optimize cushion performance through iterative design improvements. Coordinated closely with manufacturing team to streamline molding processes for seat cushion cell production. Applied advanced CAD techniques for complex medical device geometry incorporating ergonomic considerations and material property requirements. Conducted design validation studies using finite element analysis to optimize pressure distribution and comfort characteristics.

projects.title: Zeiss Reverse Engineering & Quality Solutions Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: Industrial quality solutions portfolio managing 20+ reverse engineering projects with 100% SAP ERP alignment and customer training.
projects.detailedDescription:
20+ Projects30+ Customer Demos100% SAP AlignmentTechnical Training

Comprehensive reverse engineering portfolio at Carl Zeiss Industrial Quality Solutions department. Executed over 20 diverse reverse engineering tasks using advanced 3D scanning and metrology systems with complete alignment to customer demand in SAP ERP. Presented in-depth pre-sales demonstrations of Zeiss Reverse Engineering software to 30+ prospective customers, directly supporting business development initiatives. Provided comprehensive technical training to customers and new employees on Zeiss software platforms. Interfaced with production and 3D scanner teams to minimize variation and improve inspection reliability across manufacturing operations. Conducted regular client reviews ensuring project delivery standards and customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Real-Time Manufacturing Analytics Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard for manufacturing KPI monitoring with OEE tracking, quality metrics, and production optimization.
projects.detailedDescription:
Real-time KPI TrackingOEE CalculationsQuality MetricsProduction Analytics

Advanced manufacturing analytics platform built with Power BI for comprehensive production monitoring and optimization. Implemented real-time KPI tracking systems for Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) calculations, downtime analysis, and quality control metrics. Designed interactive dashboards for production managers enabling data-driven decision making and continuous improvement initiatives. Integrated multiple data sources including production lines, quality control systems, and maintenance schedules. Applied statistical analysis for trend identification and predictive maintenance insights. Dashboard supports lean manufacturing principles and provides actionable insights for cycle time reduction and efficiency improvements.

projects.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Implementation & Process Improvement
projects.shortDescription: DMAIC methodology application with statistical analysis achieving quantified process improvements and waste reduction.
projects.detailedDescription:
DMAIC MethodologyStatistical AnalysisProcess ImprovementGreen Belt Certified

Comprehensive Lean Six Sigma Green Belt implementation project applying DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) methodology for systematic process improvement. Conducted detailed process mapping and value stream analysis to identify waste and inefficiencies in manufacturing workflows. Applied statistical analysis including hypothesis testing and ANOVA to validate improvement opportunities. Implemented 5S methodology, Kaizen events, and Kanban systems for continuous improvement culture. Developed control charts and monitoring systems to sustain improvements. Project demonstrates quantified results in cycle time reduction, quality improvements, and cost savings through data-driven decision making and lean manufacturing principles.

projects.title: Advanced CAD Design Portfolio & Technical Drawings
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive CAD portfolio featuring complex assemblies, GD&T applications, and production-ready designs across multiple platforms.
projects.detailedDescription:
Multiple CAD PlatformsComplex AssembliesGD&T ApplicationsProduction Ready

Comprehensive CAD design portfolio showcasing advanced mechanical design capabilities across SolidWorks, CATIA V5, and Fusion 360 platforms. Features complex mechanical assemblies including automotive components, production tooling, and precision manufacturing fixtures. Applied Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing (GD&T) principles for manufacturing specifications and quality control. Developed technical drawings with complete dimensioning, material specifications, and assembly instructions. Portfolio includes Tesla production station components, medical device assemblies from UT Arlington research, and Zeiss precision measurement fixtures. Demonstrates proficiency in design for manufacturing (DFM) principles and production optimization.

projects.title: FMEA & Root Cause Analysis for Manufacturing Optimization
projects.shortDescription: Systematic FMEA implementation and root cause analysis for tooling optimization, reliability improvements, and downtime reduction.
projects.detailedDescription:
FMEA MethodologyRoot Cause AnalysisReliability ImprovementDowntime Reduction

Comprehensive FMEA (Failure Mode and Effects Analysis) implementation project focusing on manufacturing process optimization and reliability improvement. Conducted systematic analysis of potential failure modes in tooling and material handling processes. Applied structured root cause analysis techniques including fishbone diagrams, 5-Why analysis, and statistical correlation studies. Developed risk priority numbers (RPN) and implemented corrective actions for high-priority failure modes. Project resulted in improved equipment reliability, reduced unplanned downtime, and enhanced product quality. Established monitoring and control systems to prevent recurrence of identified failure modes. Demonstrates proficiency in quality engineering methodologies essential for Process Engineer roles.

education.degree: Master of Science in Industrial Engineering
